attributes.action: Make the Freedom of Information Act applicable to Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not understand how MPs can vote that they can be immune from the Freedom of Information Act. Surely they must realise that this brings Parliament into disrepute and make the electorate distrust politicians even  more so than at present

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
